tasks.test: deno fmt --check && deno lint && deno test
tasks.commit: deno task test && git add -A && git commit --allow-empty-message -m ''
tasks.merge: git checkout main && git merge --squash dev && deno task test && git add -A && git commit --allow-empty-message -m '' && git branch -D dev && git branch dev && git checkout dev
tasks.transpile: mkdir -p ./dist/ && deno -A npm:esbuild@0.25.1 ./src/Indentdown.ts > ./dist/indentdown.js && sed -i '1i/* Indentdown 0.0.1 - https://indentdown.deno.dev */' ./dist/indentdown.js && deno fmt ./dist/indentdown.js
